author: castlefan86
title: good figure pack
review:
This figure pack has come out alongside the lion knights figure pack but i must say i prefer this pack out of the two.
The main reason for me liking this pack is the fact that this pack include both a newly printed version of the euro armour and two of the new design great helms.
one thing i have noticed but this appears to be across the whole range is the dragon knights only carry the smaller shields.

pros:
  • -good army builder  
  • -slightly better selection of new parts then other pack
cons:
  • -none i can really see

author: wouterdb
title: Good army builder
review:
This set is a very good expansion to your Kingdoms collection.

A few cons:

  • - no dark grey weapons for the dragon soldiers (the other sets do have dark grey swords etc)
  • - one knight with a lance but no horse
  • - only greens flags, no second gold flags

author: IndyAJD
title: You and what army?  Oh, this army.
review:
This set a great addition to any lego Kingdoms set.  Its seriously overpriced, but I think its worth it.  Its good to have because the regular sets usually come with less Dragon knights than Lion knights.  Now for the pros/cons.

Pros

  • Love the elite dragon knights!
  • The mace-man is good to have.

Cons

  • Comes pre-built, thus the "building experience" rating (depending on your opinion, this may not be a con...)
  • Whats up with the lance?
  • The price...
  • Another archer might be nice, but no big deal.

Well you may be saying "There are 2 pros, 4 cons, uh...might not want to get this one."  But I would definitely recommend this, despite the price.

author: iamcjb
title: Good variety of troops
review:
I recently returned to Lego and after receiving a great chess set decided knights would be the way. I immediately ordered these guys as they look like great minifigs, and I saw the lack of Dragons in buildings sets was upsetting for any future evil warlords.

Pros

5 dragon troops. Generally the other sets contain more Lion Knights than Dragon Knights so they are a good boost for the greens
Lots of variety:
5 different weapons
3 different helmets
A cape
Body armour
3 different torsos

Cons

Only one colour of flag. I have seen  other sets of this faction with yellow/gold flags.
No horse for the jousting knight
Nothing to build

Overall a great set for boosting your Dragon army to balance the power versus the Lions, but obviously it's not time consuming build wise.

author: pippodream
title: Dragons are ready to kick  ass!
review: The Dragon battle-pack includes five soldiers with different weapons. Pretty cool the two new helmets and the armour of the knight: I gave to this pack one more brick regarding the parts with respect to the lions pack because of the presence of these items. I think it is worth to buy this set, even for the few dragons minifigs available in the other sets of the series.
